price: Ese abo (babangikanyamana) ni bo beza cyangwa se abantu ba Tubba’i,[1] ndetse na ba bandi babayeho mbere yabo? (Abo bose) twaraboretse kubera ko bari abagizi ba nabi.
arabic: أَهُمۡ خَيۡرٌ أَمۡ قَوۡمُ تُبَّعٖ وَٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَٰهُمۡۚ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ مُجۡرِمِينَ
footnotes: [1] Tubba’i : Bari abami bo mu gihugu cya Yemen.

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: ahum khayrun am qawmu tubbaʿin wa-alladhīna min qablihim ahlaknāhum innahum kānū muj'rimīna
